subject: MSN-list Digest, Vol 7, Issue 122
body:
Send MSN-list mailing list submissions to
	msn-list@te.verweg.com

To subscribe or unsubscribe via the World Wide Web, visit
	http://duvel.te.verweg.com/cgi-bin/mailman/listinfo/msn-list
or, via email, send a message with subject or body 'help' to
	msn-list-request@te.verweg.com

You can reach the person managing the list at
	msn-list-owner@te.verweg.com

When replying, please edit your Subject line so it is more specific
than "Re: Contents of MSN-list digest..."


archive of the list:
http://msn-list.te.verweg.com/
.


Today's Topics:

   1. moderator message: do NOT send  attachments to the list
      (Museum Security Network Mailing list)


----------------------------------------------------------------------

Message: 1
Date: Mon, 28 May 2007 08:44:05 +0200
From: Museum Security Network Mailing list 
Subject: [MSN] moderator message: do NOT send  attachments to the list
To: 
Message-ID: <008801c7a0f3$9610a9c0$c231fd40$@org>
Content-Type: text/plain;	charset="US-ASCII"

Dear MSN Subscribers,

As a virus protection measure our list software does not allow formatted
text and/or attachments. So, if you want to send a press release, or any
other information,  to the list make sure it is in plain text. If you want
the subscribers to read formatted (HTML) text you better send a WWW link
directing to that text.

Thanks

Ton Cremers

Museum Security Consultancy
